properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 6 at 1:03PM HST until January 7 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WIND ADVISORY FOR PARTS OF MAUI AND HAWAII COUNTIES UNTIL 6 PM
TUESDAY...

.Very windy conditions can be expected over parts of Maui and
Hawaii counties, including the Big Island summits, for the next
few days.

* WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph.

* WHERE...for the Kohala Mountains.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines and
damage roofs. Power outages are possible. Travel will be
difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Be prepared for power outages. Watch for falling trees and power
lines when walking or driving. Stay away from downed power lines.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM TUESDAY
